metadata.name: ENERVATUS
metadata.description:
Enervation was coined from the Latin word 'ENERVATUS'

This piece expresses how the world feels exhausted as one organism. 

Unwritten rules govern the written rules in the real world aspect of society, which maybe we don’t talk about more often but we know it and it eats us up from the inside like a parasite. 

Nuance is only seen only when it suits us. We gotten so used negativity that even positives become a scarce commodity. 

Unknowns try to put us into groups so as to put out differences between the organs that make us up as humans, spreading us too thin. 

Hence our exhaustion, our Enervation. 

Nimi, 2023✨
